name: BuildGameBlock
description:
Hello! This is the BuildGameBlock Official itch.io game website, here you can download some versions of this Game, the game is on HTML wich adds compatibility.

What is BuildGameBlock?

BuildGameBlock is my own minecraft alternativity free in 2D, Google Chrome, Firefox, Opera, Internet explorer and etc have compatibility with HTML, that mades the game working

Note! The version DevST 0.41 and phones edition needs username: Player    and password: 123        or else the game will not WORK!

The game's launcher is not avaiable yet but just open the HTML file :)

From the Pre-Alpha 0.1 to Alpha 0.4 this are the controls:

click to add block

D key to delete blocks

from alpha 0.3 to alpha 0.4 you can select blocks using numbers 1-4

List of downloads names:

BGBPA01.html = BuildGameBlock Pre-Alpha 0.1

BGBA02.html = BuildGameBlock Alpha 0.2

BGBA03.html = BuildGameBlock Alpha 0.3

BGBA04CMTest.html = BuildGameBlock Alpha 0.4 Creative Mode Test

BGBDST041.html = BuildGameBlock DevST 0.41

BGBDST041Phones.html = BuildGameBlock DevST 0.41 For Phones

BGBSnap1DST042.html = BuildGameBlock Snapshot DevST 0.42 test 1
